mapper.insert: insert into COMMUTE values ( TO_DATE(replace(#{Date},' 24:',' 00:'),'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #{empNo}, NULL )
mapper.select: select * from COMMUTE where empNo =#{empNo} and (ATTEND between TO_DATE(replace(#{start},' 24:',' 00:'),'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date( replace(#{date},' 24:',' 00:') , 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') )
mapper.update: update COMMUTE set GOHOME = to_date( replace(#{date},' 24:',' 00:'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') where empNo =#{empNo} and (ATTEND between TO_DATE(replace(#{start},' 24:',' 00:'),'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date( replace(#{date},' 24:',' 00:'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') )
